quote: Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living.
The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources.
Are you really sure that a floor can't also be a ceiling?
A creative life is an amplified life.
If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.
Random chance plays a huge part in everybody's life.
Art is the elimination of the unnecessary.
The chief enemy of creativity is good sense.
You use a glass mirror to see your face. You use works of art to see your soul.
Don't wait for inspiration. It comes while working.
The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
Deadlines and things make you creative.
The enemy of art is the absence of limitations
You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
The creative process is a process of surrender, not control.
Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
The creative adult is the child who survived.
Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
Make visible what, without you, might perhaps never have been seen.
To be creative means to be in love with life.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all.
Creativity is a wild mind and a disciplined eye.
Anxiety is the handmaiden of creativity.
Creativity is an act of defiance.
Don't think about making art, just get it done.
An essential aspect of creativity is not being afraid to fail.
The poet doesn't invent. He listens.
If you steal from one author, it's plagiarism; if you steal from many, it's research.
If I waited for perfection, I wouldn't write a thing.
You can always edit a bad page. You can't edit a blank page.
A professional writer is an amateur who didn't quit.
Mindless habitual behavior is the enemy of innovation.
Creativity is contagious, pass it on.
To practice any art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow.
Imagination is the beginning of creation.
Without freedom, there is no creation.
Passion is one great force that unleashes creativity.
Imagination needs noodling - long, innefficient, happy idling, dawdling, and puttering.
The most potent muse of all is our own inner child.
Trust that still, small voice that says "This might work and I'll try it."
Art is a technique of communication.
The world of reality has its limits; the world of imagination is boundless.
Art? You just do it.
Play is the exultation of the possible.
A painting is never finished - it simply stops in interesting places.
Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world.
A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
You don't take a photograph, you make it.
The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.
A picture is worth a thousand words.
The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work.
